title: Can no longer access the download folder on pixel 3xl
content:
Ever since the beginning of december i have been unable to access my downloads folder, every time i load it up all i get is an hourglass with "cant load this content at the moment".
while i cant see anything using the interface, using the search bar loads the documents up, while this is a workaround the feature itself still doesnt work on the lastest firmware. how do i fix this
